title: Discord Comes to Xbox: Why it Matters - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.20.22
description:
Blessing and Janet talk about Discord coming to Xbox, what's going on at Platinum Games, and more!

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:30 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report  -
00:06:10 - Discord voice chat is coming to Xbox - Ash Parrish & Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:17:11 - Bruce Straley, formerly of Naughty Dog, has started a new studio - Nibel on Twitter
00:23:49 - PlatinumGames is working on several unannounced projects - Francis Kenna @ NME
00:33:37 - Ad
00:36:46 - Blizzard Albany is joining the unionization effort - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:38:22 - “Will we mostly continue to just see other QA studios unionize over the next few years?” - Kozibear
00:44:28 - Spider-Man for PC has a new trailer laying out its new features - Nibel on Twitter
00:51:37 - Sony’s partnering with Spin Master - Rachel Kaser @ GamesBeat
00:54:22 - FIFA’s getting cross-play & Women’s leagues - Chris SCullion @ VGC
01:02:11 - Out today
01:03:22 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
